S-01_Efficacy_Score.purpose: Measures net predicted utility gain based on mandate alignment.
S-01_Efficacy_Score.threshold_impact: Linear contribution to P-01 PASS criteria.

S-02_Risk_Score.purpose: Measures system exposure, volatility, and probability of cascading failure.
S-02_Risk_Score.threshold_impact: Additive constraint in P-01 PASS criteria.

compliance_audit: Mandated execution environment audit required prior to L5 registration.
